description.value: The character has mastered the intricate control protocols required to direct multiple drones simultaneously, coordinating their actions with precision.

system.benefit: Whenever the character takes an action to give directions to one or more of their Drones, they can have it affect up to Intelligence Bonus Drones instead.

prerequisites.text: Tau Drone Handler Alternative Advance, 800xp, Intelligence 45+, Trade(Technomat)

specialAbilities.name: Multi-Drone Control
specialAbilities.description: When you take an action to direct your drones, you can affect up to your Intelligence Bonus number of drones with a single action.
